structure.unit: A CABINET FOR HEALTH AND FAMILY SERVICES

law.catch_line: Gifts and grants to the Public Health Services Advisory Council, the Council for Families and Children, the Advisory Council for Medical Assistance, and the Institute for Aging.
law.text: The Public Health Services Advisory Council, the Council for Families and Children, the Advisory Council for Medical Assistance, and the Institute for Aging shall be empowered to accept gifts and grants, but all of these moneys shall be administered by the cabinet, which shall administer these funds through appropriate trust and agency accounts.
law.history: Amended 2005 Ky. Acts ch. 99, sec. 28, effective June 20, 2005. -- Amended 2000 Ky. Acts ch. 6, sec. 10, effective July 14, 2000. -- Created 1998 Ky. Acts ch. 426, sec. 20, effective July 15, 1998.
